title: Analysis of the Impact of Educational Policy and Accountability Policy on Urban Educators' Understanding of Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners Analyze the Impact of Policy Changes on Classroom Instruction in Simulation Environments, Experience Educator Decision-Making in VR-Based Scenarios, and Engage in Collaborative Learning and Data Analysis Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of educational policies on actual lesson design through discourse analysis.
Learners can analyze the positive/negative effects of accountability policies (e.g., standardized assessments) on educators' understanding of instruction.
Learners can evaluate educators' decision-making under policy pressure in a simulation environment and propose alternatives.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
